context: Simplify MVP by focusing on stacking and yield, not spending rewards
rationale: Reduces complexity, aligns with wealth-building narrative. Redemption can come later.

context: Need automatic reward crediting without merchant action at checkout
rationale: OAuth gives real-time transaction data. Zero friction for merchant after setup. Free tier available.

decision: Burt + Dex coordination via file handoff
context: Two AI agents need to collaborate on tasks
rationale: Telegram bots can't see each other. File handoff (COORDINATION.md) is reliable.

decision: Command Center design system - no emojis
rationale: Emojis feel casual. StatusDot components + monospace data = executive dashboard feel.

decision: Mobile App: React Native (Expo) for App Store
context: Need native app for iOS App Store and Google Play
rationale: React Native gives native performance, single codebase. Expo simplifies deployment.

decision: SMS OTP via Twilio Verify (not standard SMS)
context: Standard Twilio SMS blocked by carriers due to 10DLC
rationale: Twilio Verify bypasses 10DLC restrictions, works immediately.
Resend has free tier, simple SMTP setup, good DX.

context: Need managed backend with auth, real-time, serverless functions
rationale: Excellent Postgres, RLS, edge functions. Already invested.

context: Need reward token that appreciates with ecosystem growth
rationale: Bonding curve creates natural appreciation. Unlock meter gamifies holding.

decision: Multi-Loop model with siloed rewards per merchant
context: Users can belong to multiple Loops with separate balances
rationale: Siloed rewards let merchants control pools. Users see value per relationship.
